mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.type, m.path, m.component, m.perms, m.icon, m.sort_value, m.status, m.create_time, m.update_time, m.is_deleted FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.status = 1 AND m.is_deleted = 0 AND rm.is_deleted = 0 AND ur.is_deleted = 0
